text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes its me bob
Join me for learning street with bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host.
Welcome to our Phonics show
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet.
Isn’t that cool? They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
“Let’s put our hands together for a very I I I Interesting lady, Miss I!

Oh my my
Where is Miss I?
Oh! there you are!
Hello there, little Miss I I just so love your tie
An I I I imp you surely are But you are also a rock star.
Now what can we do, let’s see with the letter I, that's me.
Insect begins with an I I I and I I I infants that sometimes cry
When it’s hot, put some I I I ice.
In a water pot.Ah, it feels so nice.
And when there is lots of I I I ice make an I I I igloo, any size.
That will keep the cold out without any doubt.
What I love, you can see Is an I I I invitation.
‘cause it promises to be a merry celebration.

Ooh it's a birthday yay yay yay.
Let me I I I iron my dress for the happy day.
I am gonna have cookies and cake with sugar I I I icing that I love to make.
Hey, let’s not forget a treat that makes us beam
In a cup, cone or tub you get yes! I scream, you scream, we all scream
I I I Ice cream!
And then in that pot of I I I ink your blue pen you will dip
And write Thank You on paper pink cause to do so is polite and hip
If you fall sick with all that you ate
Go to a doctor real quick before an I I I injection is your fate
This has been fun, you know but now I I I need to go
My little pet awaits me an I I iguana who is always hungry.
Before you go, let’s find out your score

Impressive! Imaginative! Intelligent!
Inspiring!
Thank you, Miss I, and our Important Judges. .
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet
Till then Adios !
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
